content: 90-day success principles Principle 1: Your mental means are your most important asset  What is mental means?  Mental means is your most important assets   financial means: Money is nothing if doubts holding you back. When sb. posted a negative comment, i moved past it Question: What if I don’t have mental means? Question: Anybody who have strong mental means?  Sales person One of my friend, a lawyer    Principle 2: Focus on Being Present with Yourself, Rather than Trying to Be Perfect  Example  writing articles, you don’t have to make it perfect not a long articles My friend is writing articles   Kickoff Jizu can make a promise to us Wait too much, but at the end you get nothing (or less) Windows laptop or macbook?  Principle 3: Be Accountable  Review at least once a week If you miss the goal, just brush it, let it go
